item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

2/4/2013's location will be: The New Haven Meatball House....Happy hour prices are only until 7pm then it is back to regular pricing..........

Happy Hour New Haven Meatball House Happy Hour: Happy Hour Mon-Fri 5pm-7pm Sat-Sun 2pm-5pm!

Â 

1/2 priced drafts, select wines, and pizza!

Visit our draft page for our latest selections!


Gail will host and can be reached at 203-824-9869.

Please RSVP for this event so we are able to give a heads up to The New Haven Meatball House.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

For more information about the Bar, please check this link

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour 2/4 - The Meatball House
